contents.item: Until you believe in yourself, it does not matter how much you believe in God
A day should be your controlling and managing factor
Your time is the life you have at a particular moment
The life in our possession is our time
All men are equal in God’s presence
Your calling is whatever motivates you more than money
Celebrating people is a form of love
Want to keep your life? Look for work, not a job
To convert a day is to produce a product
Time utilization and effectiveness is a major marker for success
To work for God effectively, you have to expand and stretch yourself
You need intensity to be quick
Always see the positive aspect of every situation you find yourself
The nature of God is that we welcome and celebrate one another
You are living to the fullest when you live to discover and fulfill your purpose
Time is the source of all things
A life without product is a wasted life
Love is about sharing
Joblessness is a rare privilege
You must always be proactive
Don’t betray the purpose of your creation
As humans, we should be able to answer the question: “What do you do with your time?
Life shouldn’t be about survival alone but about living
Our service as believers is not complete without fellowship with people
Your calling is buried in your background and life experience
We were created by God to carry out and fulfill His divine purpose for our lives
Your net worth comes from your added value
A selfish living is a wasteful living
Employment sells out the future life
You need to live a productive life
Always invest your life in your calling and purpose
Never allow a minute to pass without asking yourself what you did with the time
We disqualify ourselves from communicating with God when we refuse to open our hearts to people
Brotherly love should be our number one principle as believers
The only limitation we have is the limitation of the mind
You have to be pragmatic, purposeful and goal-oriented to be fully effective
We glorify God only as we celebrate people
Time is the greatest wealth
Always live in the here and now
Be a source of motivation wherever you are as a believer
Celebrate people and love them even at their lowest point
Until you fight the battle against time, you won’t know how best to manage your time
We celebrate God when we share in each other’s joy and pain
We cannot glorify God when we refuse to celebrate others
We were created to purposefully live a life that glorifies God
Joblessness does not necessarily mean idleness
Survival isn’t all there is to life
Human existence is as a result of the product of time
There is always something to appreciate in people
No human was created without a purpose
Your calling helps you to have goals
Your calling is your destiny
You cannot appreciate God without appreciating people
If you don’t pursue purpose, you won’t know what to with your time
You have to be purposeful and intense to reclaim your lost years
Wisdom solves almost anything
A life without increase, production and multiplication is a wasted one
Fulfilling purpose is the major key to being productive in life
The only people remembered in history are the ones that dedicate their lives to service and purpose
Success is determined by how best you can utilize your time
To maximize time is to make sure that every second, minute and hour counts
Your destiny lies in your hands and can be molded with each passing day by the choices you make
A job shouldn’t be a mean of existence but rather, a means of sustenance
The best way to appreciate God is to appreciate His creation
No amount of service we do can impress God, only our service to ordinary people can
Don’t act based on religion always have a purpose and focus
The service of God is in people
Losing your job brings you closer to your destiny
We glorify God when we encourage and bless His creation
Make optimum use of every second that passes daily
Work is an instrument through which you carry out your life mandate
Living without regrets is maximizing time
See God in everyone regardless of who or where they are
If you are not living in active consciousness, you will always be lost
Life evolved from time
You cannot discover God without discovering people
You can never grow when you don’t place value on time
Stop wasting your life and discover who you are
When we allow people to come into our environment, God gives us His environment
A selfish life isn’t God’s purpose for you
You throw away the substance from which life is made of when you waste time
It is only when we meet the needs of the people around us that God meets our needs
Never see yourself as a disappointment or failure just because you were fired
Always work and take productive actions, do not rely on prayers and fasting alone
Uplifting God’s Kingdom on earth should be our life’s mandate as believers
Adding value to your life is the only way to fulfill your calling
Appreciate and find ways to invest in yourself
You must add value to yourself to be relevant
The amount of value produced at a certain period depends on the level of focus used to attain it
It’ll never be too late to start to make use of the time you still have left
